pkgmetadata.longdescription: Read in 'SAS' Data ('.sas7bdat' Files) into 'Apache Spark' // Read in 'SAS' Data ('.sas7bdat' Files) into 'Apache Spark' from R. 'Apache Spark' is an open source cluster computing framework available at http://spark.apache.org. This R package uses the 'spark-sas7bdat' 'Spark' package (https://spark- packages.org/package/saurfang/spark-sas7bdat) to import and process 'SAS' data in parallel using 'Spark'. Hereby allowing to execute 'dplyr' statements in parallel on top of 'SAS' data.
